DataSourceDefinition.Name: REP-046
DataSourceDefinition.Expression:
SELECT RECU.PAIS, RECU.DES_MARC, RECU.CANAL, CASE WHEN (ORIG.OID_PERI = RECU.OID_PERI) THEN '01' WHEN (ORIG.OID_PERI <> RECU.OID_PERI AND IND_RECU_AUTO = 1 ) THEN '02' WHEN (ORIG.OID_PERI <> RECU.OID_PERI AND IND_RECU_AUTO = 0 ) THEN '03' END AS TIPORECUPERACION, RECU.VAL_CODI_VENT, RECU.COD_SAP, RECU.DESC_PROD, RECU.ESTRAT, RECU.VAL_FACT_REPE, RECU.VAL_NOMB_PERI, ORIG.VAL_CODI_VENT AS VAL_CODI_VENT_O, ORIG.COD_SAP AS COD_SAP_O, ORIG.DESC_PROD AS DESC_PROD_O, ORIG.ESTRAT AS ESTRAT_O, ORIG.VAL_FACT_REPE AS VAL_FACT_REPE_O, ORIG.VAL_NOMB_PERI AS VAL_NOMB_PERI_O, RECU.IMP_PREC_CATA, ORIG.IMP_PREC_CATA AS IMP_PREC_CATA_O FROM ( SELECT I18PAIS.VAL_I18N PAIS, MARCA.DES_MARC, I18CANAL.VAL_I18N CANAL, OFEDET.VAL_CODI_VENT, PROD.COD_SAP, I18PROD.VAL_I18N AS DESC_PROD, OFEDET.IMP_PREC_CATA, ES.COD_ESTR ESTRAT, OFEDET.VAL_FACT_REPE, PERI.VAL_NOMB_PERI, MF.OID_MATR_FACT, PERI.OID_PERI, PROD.OID_PROD FROM CRA_PERIO PERI, PRE_OFERT OFE, PRE_OFERT_DETAL OFEDET, PRE_MATRI_FACTU MF, PRE_MATRI_FACTU_CABEC MFC, MAE_PRODU PROD, PRE_ESTRA ES, SEG_MARCA MARCA, ( SELECT V.VAL_OID, V.VAL_I18N FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC V WHERE V.ATTR_ENTI = 'MAE_PRODU' AND V.IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% ) I18PROD, ( SELECT V.VAL_OID, V.VAL_I18N FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC V WHERE V.ATTR_ENTI = 'SEG_PAIS' AND V.IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% ) I18PAIS, ( SELECT V.VAL_OID, V.VAL_I18N FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC V WHERE V.ATTR_ENTI = 'SEG_CANAL' AND V.IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% ) I18CANAL WHERE PERI.OID_PERI = MFC.PERD_OID_PERI AND OFE.MFCA_OID_CABE = MFC.OID_CABE AND MF.MFCA_OID_CABE = MFC.OID_CABE AND OFE.OID_OFER = OFEDET.OFER_OID_OFER AND OFEDET.OID_DETA_OFER = MF.OFDE_OID_DETA_OFER AND OFEDET.PROD_OID_PROD = PROD.OID_PROD AND OFE.COES_OID_ESTR = ES.OID_ESTR AND I18PAIS.VAL_OID(+) = PERI.PAIS_OID_PAIS AND I18CANAL.VAL_OID(+) = PERI.CANA_OID_CANA AND I18PROD.VAL_OID(+) = OFEDET.PROD_OID_PROD AND PERI.MARC_OID_MARC = MARCA.OID_MARC AND PERI.OID_PERI = %value_PERIODOVALUE% ) RECU, ( SELECT I18PAIS.VAL_I18N PAIS, MARCA.DES_MARC, I18CANAL.VAL_I18N CANAL, OFEDET.VAL_CODI_VENT, PROD.COD_SAP, I18PROD.VAL_I18N AS DESC_PROD, OFEDET.IMP_PREC_CATA, ES.COD_ESTR ESTRAT, OFEDET.VAL_FACT_REPE, PERI.VAL_NOMB_PERI, MF.OID_MATR_FACT, PERI.OID_PERI, PROD.OID_PROD FROM CRA_PERIO PERI, PRE_OFERT OFE, PRE_OFERT_DETAL OFEDET, PRE_MATRI_FACTU MF, PRE_MATRI_FACTU_CABEC MFC, MAE_PRODU PROD, PRE_ESTRA ES, SEG_MARCA MARCA, ( SELECT V.VAL_OID, V.VAL_I18N FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC V WHERE V.ATTR_ENTI = 'MAE_PRODU' AND V.IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% ) I18PROD, ( SELECT V.VAL_OID, V.VAL_I18N FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC V WHERE V.ATTR_ENTI = 'SEG_PAIS' AND V.IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% ) I18PAIS, ( SELECT V.VAL_OID, V.VAL_I18N FROM V_GEN_I18N_SICC V WHERE V.ATTR_ENTI = 'SEG_CANAL' AND V.IDIO_OID_IDIO = %value_IDIOMAVALUE% ) I18CANAL WHERE PERI.OID_PERI = MFC.PERD_OID_PERI AND OFE.MFCA_OID_CABE = MFC.OID_CABE AND MF.MFCA_OID_CABE = MFC.OID_CABE AND OFE.OID_OFER = OFEDET.OFER_OID_OFER AND OFEDET.OID_DETA_OFER = MF.OFDE_OID_DETA_OFER AND OFEDET.PROD_OID_PROD = PROD.OID_PROD AND OFE.COES_OID_ESTR = ES.OID_ESTR AND I18PAIS.VAL_OID(+) = PERI.PAIS_OID_PAIS AND I18CANAL.VAL_OID(+) = PERI.CANA_OID_CANA AND I18PROD.VAL_OID(+) = OFEDET.PROD_OID_PROD AND PERI.MARC_OID_MARC = MARCA.OID_MARC(+) AND PERI.PAIS_OID_PAIS = %value_PAISVALUE% AND PERI.MARC_OID_MARC = %value_MARCAVALUE% AND PERI.CANA_OID_CANA = %value_CANALVALUE% ) ORIG, PRE_MATRI_RECUP MRECU WHERE ORIG.PAIS = RECU.PAIS AND ORIG.DES_MARC = RECU.DES_MARC AND ORIG.CANAL = RECU.CANAL AND MRECU.MAFA_OID_COD_PPAL = RECU.OID_MATR_FACT AND MRECU.MAFA_OID_COD_RECU = ORIG.OID_MATR_FACT
AND RECU.VAL_CODI_VENT >= %value_CODIGORECUPERACIONDESDEVALUE% AND RECU.VAL_CODI_VENT <= %value_CODIGORECUPERACIONHASTAVALUE% AND ( ORIG.OID_PERI <> RECU.OID_PERI AND IND_RECU_AUTO = 0 )
ORDER BY RECU.PAIS, RECU.DES_MARC, RECU.CANAL, TIPORECUPERACION, VAL_CODI_VENT
